org.title: Share with organisation
org.descriptionOn: This skill is shared with all users of your organisation
org.descriptionOff: This skill is not shared with all users of your organisation

create.title: Share Skill with Team
create.description: This will make the skill available to all members of {{teamName}}

delete.title: Remove Team Share
delete.description: This will remove access to the skill for all members of {{teamName}}

create.title: Share Skill with Organization
create.description: This will make the skill available to all members of your organization

delete.title: Remove Share
delete.description: This will remove access to the skill for all members of your organization

properties.title: Edit skill
properties.description: Make changes to your skill here. Click save when you're done.

form.shortDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe when the AI should activate this skill...
form.shortDescriptionHint: A good trigger helps the AI understand when to use this skill.
form.instructionsPlaceholder: Detailed instructions injected when the skill is activated...

additionalDocuments.title: Additional Documents
additionalDocuments.description: Upload documents directly to this skill
additionalDocuments.disabledTooltip: To upload documents, an embedding model must be enabled.

knowledgeBases.title: Knowledge Bases
knowledgeBases.description: Connect shared knowledge bases to this skill

errors.failedToLoad: Failed to load knowledge bases. Please try again.
errors.failedToAssign: Failed to connect knowledge base. Please try again.
errors.failedToUnassign: Failed to disconnect knowledge base. Please try again.

sources.invalidFileTypeError: This file type is currently not supported.
sources.fileSourceEmptyDataError: The uploaded file contains no processable data.
sources.fileSourceTooLargeError: File is too large. Maximum file size is 50MB.
sources.fileSourceTooManyPagesError: Document has too many pages to process.
sources.fileSourceServiceBusyError: The document processing service is busy. Please try again later.
sources.fileSourceTimeoutError: Document processing timed out. The file may be too complex.

mcpIntegrations.title: Integrations
mcpIntegrations.description: Connect external MCP servers to extend skill capabilities

errors.failedToConnect: Failed to connect integration. Please try again.
errors.failedToDisconnect: Failed to disconnect integration. Please try again.
errors.failedToLoad: Failed to load integrations. Please try again.
errors.integrationNotFound: Integration not found. It may have been removed.
errors.alreadyAssigned: This integration is already connected to this skill.
errors.integrationDisabled: This integration is disabled. Please enable it first.
errors.notAssigned: This integration is not connected to this skill.

update.error: Failed to update skill. Please try again.

delete.error: Failed to delete skill. Please try again.
delete.notFound: Skill not found. It may have been deleted.
delete.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
